title: KNBS Open Data API
subtitle: RESTful Data Access Layer
description: A high-performance RESTful API providing structured access to Kenya National Bureau of Statistics datasets. Built for data analysts and developers who need reliable, well-documented access to national statistics.

title: Kenya Counties API
subtitle: Geospatial Data Service
description: Fast and reliable REST API serving demographic, economic, and spatial data for all 47 counties in Kenya. Enables data-driven applications with sub-100ms response times.

title: Geocoding Microservice
subtitle: Address Standardization Engine
description: A containerized microservice that standardizes addresses and performs geocoding for accurate mapping. Features batch processing and caching for high-throughput scenarios.

title: Financial Aggregator
subtitle: Personal Finance Backend
description: A Go-based personal finance aggregator that consolidates transactions from multiple sources. Features AI-driven categorization and spending insights with event-driven architecture.

title: EchoGraph
subtitle: Music Analytics Platform
description: A personal music tracking and analytics platform inspired by Last.fm. Monitor listening habits, discover patterns, and receive smart recommendations powered by ML.
